description:
As an admin user of the Endabank,
              I want to be able to approve or disapprove an account,
    So that only allowed users will be able to sign into the application
name: Admin Accounts Approval

elements.name: Activate an account under admin approval

steps.name: the user is logged in as an 'Admin' user
the user is on the Admin Panel section
the user toggles to 'Activate' an account under review

elements.name: Scenario Outline name: The Admin user should see the users table with the proper columns order

steps.name: the user is logged in as an 'Admin' user
the user is on the Admin Panel section
the user should see the user table columns with the following order
